translations.text: A challenger<sup foot_note=77543>1</sup> has demanded a punishment bound to come
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Saala sa-ilun biAAathabin waqiAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: for the disbelievers—to be averted by none—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lilkafireena laysa lahu dafiAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: from Allah, Lord of pathways of ˹heavenly˺ ascent,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Mina Allahi thee almaAAarij
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ

translations.text: ˹through which˺ the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit<sup foot_note=77544>1</sup> will ascend to Him on a Day fifty thousand years in length.<sup foot_note=77545>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: TaAAruju almala-ikatu warroohuilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfasana
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So endure ˹this denial, O  Prophet,˺ with beautiful patience.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasbir sabran jameela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They truly see this ˹Day˺ as impossible,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum yarawnahu baAAeeda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: but We see it as inevitable.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanarahu qareeba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day the sky will be like molten brass
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma takoonu assamao kalmuhl
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the mountains like ˹tufts of˺ wool.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watakoonu aljibalu kalAAihn
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And no close friend will ask ˹about˺ their friends,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala yas-alu hameemun hameema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ

translation.text: They will be made to see each other

translations.text: ˹although˺ they will be made to see each other. The wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that Day by their children,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu lawyaftadee min AAathabi yawmi-ithin bibaneeh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: their spouses, their siblings,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasahibatihi waakheeh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: their clan that sheltered them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafaseelatihi allatee tu/weeh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

translations.text: and everyone on earth altogether, just to save themselves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman fee al-ardi jameeAAan thummayunjeeh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But no! There will certainly be a raging Flame
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kalla innaha latha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: of the skin of the head

translations.text: ripping off scalps.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: NazzaAAatan lishshawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: It will summon whoever turned their backs ˹on Allah˺ and turned away ˹from the truth˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: TadAAoo man adbara watawalla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and gathered and hoarded ˹wealth˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajamaAAa faawAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, humankind was created impatient:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna al-insana khuliqa halooAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: distressed when touched with evil,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Itha massahu ashsharrujazooAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and withholding when touched with good—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha massahu alkhayru manooAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: except those who pray,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa almusalleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: consistently performing their prayers;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena hum AAala salatihimda-imoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and who give the rightful share of their wealth
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena fee amwalihimhaqqun maAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: to the beggar and the poor;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lissa-ili walmahroom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and who ˹firmly˺ believe in the Day of Judgment;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena yusaddiqoonabiyawmi addeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ

translations.text: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum min AAathabirabbihim mushfiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹knowing that˺ none should feel secure from their Lord’s punishment—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna AAathaba rabbihim ghayru ma/moon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and those who guard their chastity<sup foot_note=77546>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ

translations.text: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession,<sup foot_note=77547>1</sup> for then they are free from blame,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ

translations.text: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹The faithful are˺ also those who are true to their trusts and covenants;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum li-amanatihimwaAAahdihim raAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and who are honest in their testimony;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum bishahadatihimqa-imoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum AAala salatihimyuhafithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: These will be in Gardens, held in honour.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika fee jannatin mukramoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush ˹head-long˺ towards you ˹O Prophet˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Famali allatheena kafarooqibalaka muhtiAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: from the right and the left, in groups ˹to mock you˺?<sup foot_note=77548>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAani alyameeni waAAani ashshimaliAAizeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ

translations.text: Does every one of them expect to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AyatmaAAu kullu imri-in minhum anyudkhala jannata naAAeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But no! Indeed, they ˹already˺ know what We created them from.<sup foot_note=77549>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kalla inna khalaqnahummimma yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ

translations.text: So, I do swear by the Lord of ˹all˺ the points of sunrise and sunset<sup foot_note=77550>1</sup> that We are truly capable
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqiwalmagharibi inna laqadiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ

translations.text: of replacing them with ˹others˺ better than them, and We cannot be prevented ˹from doing so˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wamanahnu bimasbooqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been threatened with—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatharhum yakhoodoowayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allatheeyooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ

translations.text: the Day they will come forth from the graves swiftly, as if racing to an idol ˹for a blessing˺,<sup foot_note=77551>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yakhrujoona mina al-ajdathi siraAAankaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: with eyes downcast, utterly covered with disgrace. That is the Day they have ˹always˺ been warned of.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: KhashiAAatan absaruhumtarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allatheekanoo yooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
